attributes.action: Work for the British People before Foreigners.
attributes.additional_details: British people should be given jobs before foreigners.   Young people, in particular, are alienated particularly badly in the jobs market.    There is no perceivable future for them, except jobs through agencies and 1 or 2 day jobs, there is no security or light at the end of the tunnel for them. Agencies should be curtailed as they make so much money from the backs of the young.   They pay pittance wages and keep too much for themselves.
